talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The chief is quite the vai. Good luck
keeping up with her!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Is it true that you and the chief stopped
the sand shroud together?

How did it go? Were you two perfectly in
sync every step of the way?

Thank you for helping her! She deserves
all the support you can give!
Com_Talk_90b:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso!<sp:5:0:0> Eat right so you can grow into
a fine voe!
Com_Talk_90c:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Hee-hee!<sp:5:0:0> Well, thanks to you, I'll have to
restock now, won't I?
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso. What do you say? Want to sell
me a few more things?
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sarqso...<sp:5:0:0> It is a strange day when I am
filling my stock from a voe in the middle
of town...
Com_Talk_90a_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Such generosity! I can see why the chief
considers you a friend!
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0100>That? OK, how many do you want to sell?
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>That's not really my kind of thing...
Maybe you can sell me something else?
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey! Hey! I'm not buying anything right
off your back!<sp:5:0:0> If you want to sell it, you're
gonna have to change out of it first!
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh, did you change your mind?
That's too bad.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So you're the voe the chief has given
special permission to?

<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Why would the chief make a special exception for
you, hmm? I wonder...<clr:ffff>

<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Ooh, but I love a good mystery!


In any case, if you're planning to help the
chief, you've got to keep your energy up!<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>And mushrooms are perfect for that.
Do you have any idea how common they
are and how many nutrients they contain?
You should buy some—either to eat right
now or to save for later!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Mushrooms are perfect for keeping your
energy up! You can find them almost
anywhere, and they're nutrient rich!
Get some for yourself—for now and
for later!

If you're running a little short on <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>
but can't pass on these mushrooms, you
could always sell me something first.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll make sure to get more delicious
mushrooms in stock soon, so come back
and see me again!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>This voe really has excellent taste and clearly cares
about his health. Maybe that's why the chief made a
special exception for him?<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
GreetingBefore03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0>


If you're planning to help protect the
chief, you'd best keep your energy up
with a hearty meal!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh? You aren't done?


I thought you were going to head out,
but OK.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>This voe seems pretty indecisive. That certainly
can't be why the chief has made a special exception
for him...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you've got a little time, why not take
a look at my selection!

All the mushrooms I have are freshly
picked!<sp:5:0:0> They're nice and tender!
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>You are quite the indecisive voe,
aren't you...
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That can't be all. Come on, show me
some more.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Stop by anytime. I'm happy to see what
items you might be looking to sell.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'll buy anything as long as it isn't weird.
Too weird, anyway.
